glossary.extra: The juice also give us our lovely chitin color
glossary.name: juice
glossary.text:
By metodicaly pressing a cattle between two plate linked by a screw, our cooks can extract every single drop of liquid they produced during their short lifespan.

The juice is extermely rich in protein, vitamins and many minerals needed to sustain our life
glossary.title: Cattle Juice

glossary.name: cattle
glossary.text: Homo sapien sapien, once juiced, a perfect breakfast full of protein, vitamin an mineral
glossary.title: Cattle
